DisplayForm.Script:
<?xml version="1 0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<UiScreen>
<Title>1234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890</Title> <Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="./3.xml" ></Op> <Op type="Back" action="./2.xml" ></Op> <Op type="Skip" action="./4.xml" ><Label>OK</Label></Op> </Operations> <IoScreen>
<IoObject> <Title>1234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890</Title> <Selection id="printQuality" multiple="false"> <Item value="2" selected="true"> <Label>Photo</Label> </Item> <Item value="1" selected="false"> <Label>Normal</Label> </Item> </Selection> </IoObject>
<IoObject> <Title>1234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890</Title> <Selection id="printPaperSize" multiple="false">
<Item value="1" selected="true"> <Label>Letter</Label> </Item>
<Item value="2" selected="false"> <Label>A4</Label> </Item>
<Item value="3" selected="false"> <Label>4"x6"</Label> </Item>
<Item value="4" selected="false"> <Label>5"x7"</Label> </Item>
</Selection> </IoObject>
<IoObject> <Title>1234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890</Title> <Selection id="printPaperType" multiple="false">
<Item value="1" selected="true"> <Label>Plain Paper</Label> </Item>
<Item value="2" selected="false"> <Label>Inkjet Paper</Label> </Item>
<Item value="3" selected="false"> <Label>Brother BP61</Label> </Item>
<Item value="4" selected="false"> <Label>Brother BP71</Label> </Item>
<Item value="5" selected="false"> <Label>Other Glossy</Label> </Item>
</Selection> </IoObject>
<IoObject> <Title>1234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890</Title> <Selection id="printBorderless" multiple="false">
<Item value="1" selected="true"> <Label>On</Label> </Item>
<Item value="2" selected="false"> <Label>Off</Label> </Item>
</Selection> </IoObject>
</IoScreen> </UiScreen>
